Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
refactor: migrate to TypeScript modules with i18n support \(Week 1\)

- Split single-file HTML into modular TypeScript architecture
- Add internationalization \(NL/EN\) with language switch button
- Set up Vite build system for development and production
- Create separate modules: game logic, state, moves, UI rendering
- Keep legacy klikschaak.html as standalone version
- Update README with new project structure and commands

New structure:
- src/game/ - Game logic, state management, move validation
- src/i18n/ - Translations and language switching
- src/ui/ - Board rendering and dialogs
- src/styles/ - CSS styles

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
build: add production build for GitHub Pages

- Build TypeScript to bundled JS/CSS for static hosting
- Move dev index.html to index.dev.html
- Add compiled assets/ folder with hashed filenames
- Update README with Week 2 roadmap \(drag-drop, premoves\)

GitHub Pages now serves the production build at /index.html
Development version available at /index.dev.html \(requires Vite\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
